author: Brendan Graeber
title: Animal Crossing: How to Get a 3 Star Island Eval
description: When Tom Nook has upgraded Resident Services into a proper town hall, there will be a few noteworthy features added to the list of services the building
content:
How to Unlock Island Evals[edit]
In order to get this feature in Resident Services, youll need to do a lot of groundwork to build out your island, including the following:
Isabelle has a number of suggestions she can give for ways to improve your town's qua… [+5556 chars]
